name: Introduction to Social History
description: This course introduces students to the study of social history and provides a broad overview of the field.

name: History of Social Movements
description: This course examines the history of social movements, including their origins, development, and impact on society.

name: History of Social Reform
description: This course covers the history of social reform, including the causes and effects of various reform movements.

name: History of Gender and Sexuality
description: This course examines the history of gender and sexuality, with an emphasis on how they have changed over time.

name: History of Race and Ethnicity
description: This course examines the history of race and ethnicity, with an emphasis on how they have changed over time.
